item.title: Illustrations with math in your tex document
item.description: TL;DR This guide explains how to draw and add figures to a tex document using the illustration program Inkscape and how to automate that process. When writing my Thesis paper, I couldn’t find any resources on how to draw and embed figures containing math expressions in .tex documents. Specifically, I wanted math equations inside my figures that will not look pixilated after modifying the figure size from the tex code. Eventually, after much trial and error, I found a workflow that I was happy with.
